title: Premium chest
body:
Hello when i want open my premium chest who i get when up to 5lvl an window pops up and in it is written ''Crafting Failed.Please try again in a few minutes'' but i try open it after this few minutes or open after relog and nothing still dont want open.It's a chest with skin,other one who give me {{champion:22}} {{champion:86}} with skin for one of them and few blue gems I already opened without any problem.I have key and craft shows me that i can open 1 chest.
What u think about option that key is buged then i need drop and craft another?

replies.body: There looks to be an issue right now for some players getting a bad motivator error while opening a new player chest.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll manually process this for you.  See you there!
